msg.msgText: NOTES: 1. All "Key=value" pair must be enclosed within double quotation marks. 2. The IBM MessageSight server must be restarted when the update has completed. 3. For LDAP over SSL protocol, the certificate must be uploaded using "file get" command and apply the certificate using "imaserver apply" command

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
